formulas.raw: Adjusted amount \[ \text{Adjusted} = A_0 \times \frac{\mathrm{CPI}(t)}{\mathrm{CPI}(0)} \] Cumulative inflation \[ \text{Cumulative}~(\%) = \left(\frac{\mathrm{CPI}(t)}{\mathrm{CPI}(0)} - 1\right)\times 100 \] Average annual rate \[ \text{Average Annual} = \left(\frac{\mathrm{CPI}(t)}{\mathrm{CPI}(0)}\right)^{\frac{1}{t-0}} - 1 \]
